query:
SELECT 
  'recharges' as source,
  id,
  customerId,
  amount,
  paymentMethod,
  status,
  transactionId,
  createdAt
FROM recharges 
WHERE paymentMethod = 'pix'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT

  id,
  customerId,
  amount,
  paymentMethod,
  status,
  transactionId,
  createdAt
FROM recharges 
WHERE paymentMethod = 'pix'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
